craft.title: Craft and materials
craft.subtitle: Sustainable wood from Norwegian forests
craft.content: We use only first-class wood from sustainable forestry. Each lamp is hand-shaped and finished with natural oils that highlight the beauty of the wood.

steps.title: Finishing
